commit.message:
tree-ssa-pre.c (get_sccvn_value): Simplify.

2008-03-10  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-ssa-pre.c (get_sccvn_value): Simplify.
	(compute_avail): Do not add stmt uses to AVAIL_OUT.

From-SVN: r133074
